entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
